{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20553v1", "title": "Characterizing the Polynomial-Time Minimizable $ω$-Automata", "summary": "A central question in the theory of automata is which classes of automata can
be minimized in polynomial time. We close the remaining gaps for deterministic
and history-deterministic automata over infinite words by proving that

to minimize, as are history-deterministic B\"uchi automata with
